content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Dear Hassan,

Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. As a landlord, I am always looking for the best possible deal for myself. After careful consideration, I believe that the rental price of 1,500 Euros per month would be a fair and reasonable amount for this apartment, which is 25 square meters in size.

I hope this price works for you. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine

name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
I am grateful that you are interested in renting my apartment, Hassan. However, I must inform you that the rental price of 1,500 Euros per month is a fair and reasonable amount for this 25 square meter apartment.

I understand that you may want to negotiate, but I am not willing to lower the price any further. I believe that this rental rate accurately reflects the value of the apartment and the cost of living in Munich.

If you have any other concerns or questions, please don't hesitate to ask. Otherwise, I must politely decline your request for a lower rental price.

Thank you for your understanding,
Heinrich Heine
